market_value_definition: Market Value is defined as 'an opinion of the best price at which the sale of an interest in property would have been completed unconditionally for cash consideration on the date of the valuation, assuming (1) a willing seller; (2) that, prior to the date of valuation, there had been a reasonable period (having regard to the nature of the property and the state of the market) for the proper marketing of the interest and for the agreement of the sale price; (3) that, the state of the market, level of values and other circumstances were, on any earlier assumed date of exchange of contracts, the same as on the date of valuation; (4) that no account is taken of any additional bid by a prospective buyer with a special interest; (5) that both parties to the transaction had acted knowledgeably, prudently and without compulsion.'
documents_description: Sale Deed, Approved Plan, Electricity Bill, Registration Plan
valuer_comments:
- The subject property is a residential independent RCC house located at Plot No. 153, Green Villas, Ameenpur, Sangareddy District, Telangana.
- Land area as per Sale Deed is 150 sq yd or 1,350 sq ft.
- Built-up area considered as per the Sale Deed and Registration Plan is 3,840 sq ft (Ground, First, Second Floor: 1,280 sq ft each).
- No deviations in area or setbacks observed as per the approved plan and Sale Deed.
- No negative area features observed in the vicinity; the area is primarily residential and in good condition.
- The property is self-occupied by the buyer.
- Amenities include modular kitchen and fixed wardrobes in bedrooms.
- For valuation, adopted built-up area as per Sale Deed and plan.
- The property is within city/urban limits (Ameenpur), not a gram panchayat area.
- All information is based on documents provided and visual inspection of the property.
valuer_declaration: I confirm that the market value for the subject property as on 15 June 2025 is INR NA/- [NA] and the value of amenities as on 15 June 2025 is INR NA/- [NA] taking into consideration the market dynamics and the condition of the property, its location, and amenities available.
disclaimer_text: Please note that the above is a valuation and not a structural survey. CBRE is not responsible to HSBC or the purchaser of the above property for any flaws and/or faults with the property not detected by the above Valuer.
